basics.name: Jan-Eric Gaidusch
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate software engineer with 8+ years of hands-on software development and IT operations experience across several industries. Seeking new challenges to build exceptional technology products.

work.name: Parloa GmbH
work.summary: Parloa is a conversational AI company that provides a platform to manage AI agents for customer service - enabling enterprises to automate and improve customer interactions across voice, chat, email etc.
highlights: Designed and implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) product powering AI agents in customer service use cases
Built the foundation of the Agent Management Platform, enabling scalable creation and management of AI agents
Contributed to growing the engineering team by supporting interviews, onboarding and mentoring

Redesigned and rebuilt the Conversational Platform architecture (channels: SIP, WebSocket, REST; audio pipeline: STT, TTS, VAD) into a robust, message-driven system reducing latency and improving scalability

work.name: ProductionToGo GmbH
work.summary: ProductionToGo GmbH is a full-service provider in the industrial 3D printing sector. They sell 3D printing hardware and software and perform printing services.
highlights: Designed the foundation of a platform to evaluate 3D printer settings across different parameters and inputs.
Contributed to software development in an industrial 3D printing environment

work.name: Kauz GmbH
work.summary: Kauz develops linguistic-based Chatbots. With their NLU-Engine, Kauz improves the service quality and provides constant availability for customers and employees.
highlights: Consolidated and migrated the operations landscape by introducing a cloud-agnostic Kubernetes-oriented approach.
Introduced a new architecture to enable better stability and scalability of the existing product.

work.name: Neohelden GmbH
work.summary: Neohelden develops Neo, a self-learning AI assistant for businesses that can be used via voice and chat. Neo automates processes, increases operational efficiency, and levels up the user experience.
highlights: Migrated and reimplemented a NodeJS backend application from FeathersJS to NestJS
Integrated Speech To Text and Text To Speech technologies as microservices
Developed and maintained a python SDK
Integrated support for multiple NLU Technologies into the core application
Introduced kubernetes compatibility with helm charts
Maintained and optimized development automations with Gitlab CI and Github Actions

work.name: Fiducia & GAD IT AG
work.summary: Fiducia & GAD IT AG (now called Atruvia) is the main it service provider for the Volksbanken in Germany. They focus on developing and providing banking software.
highlights: Developed & Maintained a middle layer application to manage and execute BI reports on mainframe machines

volunteer.summary: Freizeit Aktiv e.V. is club offering its members multiple options to do sports and is also participating in the local carnival.
